block.p: BODNER-Leo. The Yeshivah of Flatbush deeply mourns the passing of Leo Bodner, beloved father of Allen J. Bodner, Honorary President, Gilda Kaufman and Howard Bodner. Our heartfelt condolences are extended to the entire Bodner family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Steven R. Shamah, President Dennis M. Eisenberg, Exec. Dir.
BODNER-Leo. Young Israel of Flatbush mourns the loss of its member, Leo Bodner, father of Honorary President Allen, daughter, Gilda Kaufman, and son, Howard.
